alert.note: Alert for Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yoakum County through 515 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Plains, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief funnel clouds are possible with this storm. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects and vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
